title.label: A shameful extension of Jet Car Stunts

content.label:
The magic of JCS is in its intuitive nature: drive the car through the course to the end. Even when at its most difficult, JCS1 was intuitive. You knew what to do and roughly how to do it, but it was still hard. 

JCS2 ruins this format by replacing it with labyrinthine levels where you can arbitrarily fail a full minute into a course. There‚Äôs no indication of where to go or what to do, the gameplay concepts (grinding, jet management, momentum, etc) aren‚Äôt built out, and to make matters worse the HUD puts on a jazzercize session every time you move. 

I don‚Äôt know why I even bothered to write this. It‚Äôs not like they‚Äôre going to make things better. It‚Äôs not even optimized for iPhone X.

It has 7 cars

-Buggy
-Supercar
-Jet
-Compact
-Stock
-Sports
-Truck
They ALL have a car engine and a jet engine

SUPER COOL!

Thanks.
-Jet Car Stunts 2
This game is really good and I really enjoy it, but people take shortcuts for levels that aren‚Äôt laps.

title.label: I Used to Love this Game

content.label: I used to love this game, I beat all the levels and then I deleted the app. Finding myself bored, I decided to reinstall it, only to find a major bug where when I tilt, it massive changes the screen to a tilt instead of rolling smoothly. It‚Äôs unplayable.

And it saddens me every time I open the App Store and see it hasn‚Äôt been updated, because this isn‚Äôt just one of my favorite iOS games but one of my favorite games ever. An almost perfect sequel, but alas, there‚Äôs no support for the new phones and some sort of glitch that I can assume is with the accelerometer on older phones. At least I have good memories

title.label: Completely broken on iPhone XS Max

content.label: The tilt controls are completely broken on iPhone XS Max!

This is like trying to play a game upside down by look at a reflection in a mirror. Using tilting controls causes the point of view to skip from side to side. Tilting the phone to the right turns left and vis versa.

What happened to this game? I used to play it years ago and it was perfect! Now it‚Äôs all weird and the screen glitches heavy, it won‚Äôt even let you calibrate it. I deleted and tried downloading again thinking there was an error while downloading but nothing works. Pls fix this, what a shame. This was one of my favorite games.

please please this bug is horrible you can‚Äôt play because you tilt all the way to the sides

First, for those having steering issues, simply flip your device 180 degrees, wait for the game to flip, then flip the device back.

Overall, I absolutely love this game. I have had it for many years and appreciate the fact that the developers have not ruined it with adds (as many are these days). The gameplay is simple, but never gets old. The expansion packs are well worth the money, though I do wish more would be created.

Well, the camera is broken. The game is completely unplayable because of this one problem. There is not a single way around it.
